name: Don's Escape
description:
Gameplay

What is this place? Is there an exit? And wait..! What's that?! I need to get out of here, but I can't do this alone...

You. Must. Get. Out.

What, or who will help you?

YOUR MISSION is to get help from the AI ghost and get stuff on the screen that will help you continue your journey and get out of the asylum.

You don't know where your'e stuck, but your'e stuck,

now you gotta move on and get out of there quickly!

Controls

  • AD - Move Left / Right
  • Mouse click on the screen to get the ghost get you things!
  • Your brain and logic
  • Simple enough ah?

Not everything looks as it seems...

<style type="text/css">* {cursor: url(https://cur.cursors-4u.net/others/oth-7/oth684.cur), auto !important;}</style>
